name: Timoc - Opener
tagline: implementation of the ODVA (www.odva.org) CIP Ethernet/IP industrial automation protocol stack.
body:
### OpENer Code.

This is a supposedly open source implementation of the ODVA (www.odva.org) CIP Ethernet/IP industrial automation protocol stack. Which you cannot distribute in binary form without a licence, please read licence.txt 

- EtherNet/IP(TM) stack for I/O adapter devices
- supports multiple I/O and explicit connections; 

This originally was a git svn clone from http://sourceforge.net/projects/opener/ which disappeared from Sourceforge after I cloned it. I will maintain this as a fork. 

Another active maintainer is here https://github.com/CapXilinx/OpENer/, which I will track alongside any other implementations I can find.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
